thread.title: Russia hits 27 targets in Syria's Homs, Hama and Raqa: Military - Region - World

title: Russia hits 27 targets in Syria's Homs, Hama and Raqa: Military - Region - World
text:
Related Russia will soon suffer 'casualties' after Syria intervention: US defence secretary Russia raids have weakened armed groups, helped army: Syria general Russia intensifies strikes as Syria army launches offensive US insists no cooperation with Russia on Syria air strikes Russia's air force hit 27 "terrorist" targets in Syria overnight, the defence ministry said, as Moscow ramped up its campaign in the war-torn country.
"Russian warplanes conducted 22 flights overnight. The crew of Sukhoi Su-34, Sukhoi Su-24M and Sukhoi Su-25 aircraft struck 27 terrorist targets on Syrian territory," the defence ministry said in a statement, adding it had hit Islamic State targets in the provinces of Hama, Raqa and Homs.
